Articles.Content:
This is a game where you have to guess who said the quote that the user above you posted.

Example: User 1: "One small step for man, one giant leap for mankind."

User 2: - Neil Armstrong

(then put another quote for the next person to guess)

There are only two rules:

  • You must not post made up quotes, they must be from an actual living person/character.
  • They must be recognized as being spoken by one specific person. (eg. You can't quote, "Happy birthday!")

You must also follow the rules of the forums.

If you don't know who said it just say that you're not sure.

Have fun! I will start.

"Hold on to your butts."

Edited June 1, 2014 by ICrashRockets

John Arnold, Jurassic Park

All right, I've been thinking. When life gives you lemons, don't make lemonade! Make life take the lemons back! Get mad! I don't want your damn lemons; what am I supposed to do with these? Demand to see life's manager! Make life rue the day it thought it could give Cave Johnson lemons! Do you know who I am? I'm the man who's gonna burn your house down... with the lemons! I'm gonna get my engineers to invent a combustible lemon that burns your house down!

Pacman, Pacmania

"It was not better before, it was only different"

Pacman' date=' Pacmania

"It was not better before, it was only different"[/quote']

A). Wrong. Cave Johnson, Portal 2

. Not sure.

C)."You know, I'd like to take this opportunity to say that this is a very poorly designed bomb and I think we should say something to somebody when we get back."

Got some vague ideas, but not sure

"Ooh whats this? Lets crash into it!"

HINT: its a KSP Youtuber

Danny2462

"Never interrupt your enemy when he is making a mistake."

Danny2462

"Never interrupt your enemy when he is making a mistake."

Eisenhower.

"Today... today. At the edge of our hope, at the end of our time, we have chosen not only in ourselves but in EACH OTHER. Today there's not a man or woman in here that shall stand alone! Not today. Today we face the monsters that are at our door, and bring the fight to them! TODAY, WE ARE CANCELLING THE APOCALYPSE!!!!!"

Wasn't that in Independence Day?

Marvin, the Paranoid Android, from HHGttG!

"Sir, the possibility of successfully navigating an asteroid field is approximately three thousand, seven hundred and twenty to one!"

You strain to understand what youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re seeing. Two ghostly white figures in coveralls and helmets are softly dancing under a pitch-black sky. Encumbered as they are, they seem to be flyingÃ¢â‚¬â€a little. You rub your eyes, but the strange tableau persists."

C3PO, Star Wars episode 4

Tsk Tsk. Episode 5, The Empire Strikes Back. Turn in your lightsaber

Wasn't that in Independence Day?

Nope. Stacker Pentecost's speech before Operation Pitfall in Pacific Rim.

Hmmm... no quote to guess...

"When in doubt, C4"

Edit - Just remembered it's also in my sig.

I am going to repost my quote, because no one guessed it...
